participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, laid-back, and free-spirited. Enjoys new experiences and values independence.
participant_1.background: I go surfing any chance I get. I could never be locked down to one partner. My dreams are often bizarre. I earn passive income that no one knows about.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Curious, sweet-toothed, and imaginative. Loves exploring new worlds through books and enjoys a good adventure.
participant_2.background: I eat tuna fish salad at least every day. I can't get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth. I read sci-fi space adventures with a passion. I have sandy brown hair and green eyes.

content.text: I'm a big fan of sci fi! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Ender's Game series and the Expanse series.
Those are both great series! I also really like the Dune series.
I've heard good things about Dune, but I haven't read it yet.
You should definitely check it out. It's a classic.
I will! What are some of your favorite sci fi movies?
I love Star Wars, Blade Runner, and Alien.
Those are all great movies! I also love Interstellar and The Martian.
I love Interstellar too! It's such a beautiful movie.
Me too! I'm a sucker for space movies.
Me too! I think they're so cool.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go surfing, read, and watch movies.
I love to surf too! I also like to go swimming and hiking.
Me too! I love being outdoors.
So, what are you looking for in a partner?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and adventurous.
I'm looking for someone who is similar to me.
I think we might be a good match!
I think so too!
